scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run update-proto-buffer && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json -outDir ./dist && cp -R src/QRProtocolBuf dist/QRProtocolBuf
scripts.protobuf: npx pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o src/QRProtocolBuf/proto.js crypto-coin-message-protocol/*.proto; npx pbts -o src/QRProtocolBuf/proto.d.ts src/QRProtocolBuf/proto.js
scripts.update-proto-buffer: git submodule update --remote && npm run protobuf
